Question
========
In the study of variable working hours for employees, it was found that employee absences improved after variable working hours became possible and that absences were generally less than before that possibility. What can be concluded?

Answerlist
----------
* The program works.
* An unverifiable historical event may have triggered this change.
* A regression effect may have occurred.
* All of the above answer options.
